update WorkingHour
function_description_snapshot = #{functionDescriptionSnapshot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
referred_user_id = #{referredUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},

where working_hour_id = #{workingHourId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
